title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Beyond Traditional Computing: How WorkSpaces Powers the Future Of Work (EUC212)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 超越传统计算：WorkSpaces 如何驱动未来工作模式 (EUC212)
abstract: Discover how Amazon WorkSpaces is transforming the digital workplace with new end user features and intelligent management and automation capabilities. In this breakout, Deloitte will share how they deploy WorkSpaces at scale globally for different personas, and Dizzion will share how they use AI to automate onboarding, provisioning, and intelligent monitoring. Learn how with WorkSpaces, you can modernize yesterday’s deployment patterns, and build the foundation for tomorrow’s flexible and scalable AI enabled workplace.
abstract_cn: 了解Amazon WorkSpaces如何通过新的最终用户功能以及智能管理和自动化能力来变革数字化工作场所。在此分会场中，德勤将分享他们如何为不同角色在全球范围内大规模部署WorkSpaces，Dizzion将分享他们如何使用AI来自动化入职、配置和智能监控。了解如何通过WorkSpaces现代化昨日的部署模式，并为明日灵活可扩展的AI赋能工作场所奠定基础。
